entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 13. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers early this evening then 30 percent chance of flurries later this evening. Clearing late this evening. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming north 30 gusting to 50 early this evening then light before morning. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023
